project.name: Seeds
project.description: The Gentoo Seeds team is responsible for the development of 'stage4' tarballs, used for seeding boxes with ready-to-go versions of Gentoo.

p.b: What we do, and who we are

longdescription.p: The Gentoo Seeds team looks after the packages in the 'seeds' category of Portage. The 'seeds' are out-of-the-box setups of Gentoo for common tasks, such as web serving.

project.goals: Our goal is to provide tailored releases of Gentoo, suitable for quickly seeding a box with Gentoo.

body.p: The best way to reach us is on IRC in the #gentoo-seeds channel on irc.freenode.net.
